biotools.summary: Permutation-based method for investigating changes in the activity of multi-gene networks. It utilizes inter-gene correlation information to detect significant alterations in gene network activities. Currently it can be applied to two-sample comparisons.

bioschemas.name: pcot2
bioschemas.summary: Permutation-based method for investigating changes in the activity of multi-gene networks. It utilizes inter-gene correlation information to detect significant alterations in gene network activities. Currently it can be applied to two-sample comparisons.
